2406.08929.title: Step-by-Step Diffusion: An Elementary Tutorial
2406.08929.paper_summary:
We present an accessible first course on diffusion models and flow matching
for machine learning, aimed at a technical audience with no diffusion
experience. We try to simplify the mathematical details as much as possible
(sometimes heuristically), while retaining enough precision to derive correct
algorithms.
2406.08929.paper_summary_zh: 我們提供一個關於擴散模型和流匹配的平易近人的入門課程，目標受眾為沒有擴散經驗的技術人士。我們盡可能簡化數學細節（有時採用啟發式方法），同時保留足夠的精確度以推導出正確的演算法。
2406.08929.author: Preetum Nakkiran et.al.
2406.08929.authors: Preetum Nakkiran, Arwen Bradley, Hattie Zhou, Madhu Advani
